programme.title: Merci professeur !
programme.desc: A short review of the French language, its quirks, accents and news. Presented by: Bernard Cerquiglini.

programme.title: Loup
programme.sub-title: Le loup qui voulait aider un oiseau à voler

programme.title: Mehdi et Val
programme.desc: Of rings'n'things Flora has to save the potato field where all is definitely not well. Directed by: Martin Cadotte, Jocelyn Forgues (season 4, Canada, 2019) Cast: Clifford Leduc-Vaillancourt (Mehdi), Marilou Forgues (Valérie), Antoine Marchand-Gagnon (Alix), Elliot Miville-Deschênes (Tristan), Emilia Charron (Roselyne), Ève Galhidi-Gratton (Flora)

programme.title: En plein coeur
programme.desc:
A young police cadet is found dead on the premises of the academy. His sister, also a student, refuses to believe he killed himself. Doubts confirmed by Inspector Anne Voreppe and Captain Chrystel Chesnot. Investigating amongst their own, in a police academy, means everyone is treading on eggshells...

Directed by: Bruno Garcia (France, 2021)

Screenplay: Emmanuel Bézier, Christophe Gavat, Yann Le Gall

Cast: Fatou N'Diaye (Chrystel Chesnot), Annie Grégorio (Anne Voreppe), Sam Karmann (Richard Leprince), Alexandre Brasseur (Gimenez), Léa Léviant (Émilie Leprince), Stéphane Debac (Dangro), Sophie Letellier (Carole Lebret)

Genre: thriller

programme.title: Les 100 lieux qu'il faut voir
programme.desc: The Haute-Garonne, from Toulouse to the foothills of the Pyrenees Lying in south-west France, the Haute-Garonne ("Nauta Garona" in Occitan) is a department that stretches for 145 kilometres. An exceptional geography equalled by its equally exceptional variety of landscapes: plains, rolling green hills, mountains. From Toulouse to the Pyrenees, we meet men and women with a passion for Occitanie. Directed by: Marie David (season 6, France, 2019)

programme.title: MONTE-CARLO RIVIERA-SAISON 5 (8 ET 9)
programme.desc:
The story of the only woman to rule Monaco: Princess Louise Hippolyte. A visit to the Centre Botanique de Monaco and its exceptional collection of cacti and exotic plants. We also discover the Fête de la Saint-Éloi, in Tende in the Roya Valley. An immersive exploration of the Agriates Desert in Corsica.
Presented by: Cyril Viguier.

programme.title: Rassemblance
programme.desc:
Sorofin (Mali)
One spring day in 1978, Sorofin arrived in France to join her husband in Montreuil, known as "the little Bamako of Seine-Saint-Denis". A working mother totally dedicated to bringing up her seven children, she has also become one of the pillars of the Association des Femmes Maliennes de Montreuil.
With Magloire Delcros-Varaud. Directed by: Yaëlle Benaim (France, 2022)

programme.title: Sur le front
programme.desc:
Medicines: a time bomb
Why are certain common illnesses increasingly difficult to treat? Where are our medicine manufactured? Can they really be recycled? How to invent tomorrow's treatments? Hugo Clément investigates the rivers polluted by drug residues and the problem of multiresistant bacteria.
Directed by: Victor Peressetchensky (France, 2022) With Hugo Clément.

programme.title: Tendance XXI
programme.sub-title: L'alliance, Porcelaine de limoge, Robe Transparente, Bijou
programme.desc: Season 7, episode 11: L'alliance, Porcelaine de limoge, Robe Transparente, Bijou

programme.title: Sous les étoiles d'Al-Ula
programme.desc: A special programme recorded in the heart of the ancient city of Al-`Ula, Saudi Arabia. Presented by: Laury Thilleman

programme.title: Rassemblance
programme.desc:
Sorofin (Mali)
One spring day in 1978, Sorofin arrived in France to join her husband in Montreuil, known as "the little Bamako of Seine-Saint-Denis". A working mother totally dedicated to bringing up her seven children, she has also become one of the pillars of the Association des Femmes Maliennes de Montreuil.
With Magloire Delcros-Varaud. Directed by: Yaëlle Benaim (France, 2022)

programme.title: Diane de Poitiers
programme.desc:
Episode 2: More than a queen
Well aware of the pitfalls awaiting the ladies of the court, Diane de Poitiers was in need of allies. But by revealing a secret to Catherine de' Medici she created her most serious enemy. On the death of François I, Diane became the favourite of the new king, Henri II.
Directed by: Josée Dayan (France, 2021) Screenplay: Didier Decoin Cast: Isabelle Adjani (Diane de Poitiers), Hugo Becker (Henri II), Samuel Labarthe (François I), Virginie Ledoyen (Anne de Pisseleu), Gaia Girace (Catherine de' Medici), Jeanne Balibar (Marguerite de Navarre), Joeystarr (Count of Kervannes), Jean-François Balmer (Inquisitor Ory), Gérard Depardieu (Nostradamus), Michel Fau (Le Camus), Guillaume Gallienne (Ambroise Paré) Genre: historical

programme.title: Les maîtres de la peinture moderne
programme.desc: Ferdinand Hodler Né en 1853 à Berne, Ferdinand Hodler a eu toute sa vie durant une conscience aiguë de la fragilité humaine et de la mort. Il est considéré comme le peintre suisse qui a le plus marqué la fin du XIXe et le début du XXe siècle à travers plusieurs périodes artistiques. Réalisation : Jacques Vichet (France, 2019)

programme.title: Regarde-moi
programme.desc:
Lofti, a Tunisian immigrant in his forties, living in Marseille, divides his time between his electrical goods store and his French girlfriend who's pregnant. But when his ex-wife has a stroke, he suddenly finds himself responsible their young son, Amr, 9 years-old and autistic. A child he's never known...

Directed by:Nejib Belkadhi (Tunisia, 2017)

Cast: Nidhal Saadi, Idryss Kharroubi, Saoussen Maalej

Genre: Dramedy

programme.title: De Gaulle, premières batailles
programme.desc:
17 May 1940, Montcornet, in the Aisne. At dawn the tanks of the 4th armoured division attack, commanded by a 49 year-old colonel, Charles de Gaulle. We look back at one of the founding events of the de Gaulle legend and the first major counter-offensive of the Second World War.

Directed by: Serge Tignères (France, 2019)

programme.title: OPJ Pacifique Sud
programme.desc:
Worried by the fact she can't remember anything, Clarissa keeps going over in her mind the evening with Raphaël Mayer, the man she met at the cemetery. A body is found during a rodeo. An accident? Unlikely, the victim was an experienced rider...

Directed by: François Bigrat (season 1, France, 2019)

Cast: Yaëlle Trulès (Clarissa Hoarau), Antoine Stip (Gaspard Watson), Nathan Dellemme (Jackson Bellerose), Marielle Karabeu (Kelly Kwaté), Hindra Armede (Agathe Hoarau), Clémentine Julienne (Joséphine Fleury), Julia Paul (Manon Lambert), Alexandre Varga (Raphaël Mayer)

Genre: detective

programme.title: OPJ Pacifique Sud
programme.desc:
Clarissa tries to sort truth from lies in the accusations of assault levelled against Raphaël Mayer. Kelly and Jackson continue their investigation in the world of the rodeo, and in the bars of Nouméa. A hypothesis begins to take shape. Gaspard discovers that his wife is cheating on him...

Directed by: François Bigrat (season 1, France, 2019)

Cast: Yaëlle Trulès (Clarissa Hoarau), Antoine Stip (Gaspard Watson), Nathan Dellemme (Jackson Bellerose), Marielle Karabeu (Kelly Kwaté), Hindra Armede (Agathe Hoarau), Clémentine Julienne (Joséphine Fleury), Julia Paul (Manon Lambert), Alexandre Varga (Raphaël Mayer)

Genre: detective
